name: Project BrightRED (Slenderman's Shadow maps Remaster)
description:
A little remaster of Slenderman's Shadow maps.

Im a newbie in unity,so don't await something fascinating.:DD 

Maps that im gonna remaster:

/////////2019/////////////////////////////

Elementary - complete.

7th Street - complete.

/////////2020/////////////////////////////

Hospice - in dev.

Sanatorium - in dev. 

Claustrophobia - probably.

Remaster - NeverCore

Original - Marc Stenee,Wray Burgess
